about_the_game:
All screenshots shown are work in progress. The visuals will be overhauled!


The ultimate crane game simulator set in a Japanese arcade. Play a wide variety of different claw games, from the traditional ones to some more exotic and unique versions!
100% physics based, to be as close to the original as possible. Only that our machines are not rigged!

Fully Simulated Physics!

  • A lot of time and effort went into these physics to make them feel fair, fun and as close to the original as possible!
  • All claw machines are only based on physics, nothing is faked!
  • Detailed colliders! Utilize the shape of each prize to get the perfect grip!
  • Fair! Each grab has the full force and we don't drop the prize midway without a good reason!

Unlock them all!

  • Collect a wide variety of prizes, from stuffed animal, other toys to ... some more unusual things...
  • Unlock a complete set of prizes for extra rewards
  • Check your progress in the logbook.

Photo Mode!

  • Unlocked prizes, like items, toys & characters can all be used in the photo mode
  • Place rotate & scale them whichever way you want
  • Some prizes, like humanoid characters have more complex posing options, like moveable limbs, fingers & facial expressions
  • Unlock new locations by completing full sets of prizes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 32 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i4 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play all your favorite claw machines! Features fully simulated physics for a fun and fair experience! Win and collect all prizes. Use these prizes in the photo mode and unleash your creative side!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
